Sample Data.Sentence: Predominantly hyperdense subdural hematoma layering over the left cerebral convexity and left tentorium, measuring up to 15 mm in greatest diameter. There is also a small amount of subdural hemorrhage along the right tentorium and the falx.

Entities.Name: Size of Midline Shift
Entities.Definition: Presence and degree of midline shift (in millimeters).

Sample Data.Sentence: There is associated mass effect with effacement of the adjacent left cerebral sulci and left lateral ventricle and 6-mm of rightward midline shift.

Entities.Name: Thickness of Largest SDH (in millimeters)
Entities.Definition: The thickest part of the largest SDH in millimeters.

Sample Data.Sentence: The component overlying the left cerebral convexity measures 11-mm and the tentorial component measures 15-mm.
Predominantly hyperdense subdural hematoma layering over the left cerebral convexity and left tentorium, measuring up to 15 mm in greatest diameter.

Dataset.Name: CT scan reports for subdural hematoma patients
Dataset.Details: The dataset consists of 643 cranial CT scan reports collected from a single center, annotated for the presence and characteristics of subdural hematoma.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: The algorithm's code and pattern-matching approach used for extracting data from CT scan reports are available publicly under a general public license for non-commercial use.
